title: “The world of finance is completely changing now, and it's being rebuilt from scratch | Ctech - CTech
content: “The world of finance is completely changing now, and it's being rebuilt from scratch | Ctech  CTech
description: A thing about FinTech lending is that after drawing in a potential client, companies must decide if they want to sell them the product or not, says Dr. Gal Aviv, CEO at BLender Financial Technologies.
